channel.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
channel.description:
I know what moparclassic is...but i am failing to see why it needs it's own actual board or even category for that matter. We have a "mopar client" that is only listed as a sticky somewhere. Yet, moparclassic gets it's own board really? I doubt it will be THAT active.(prove me wrong!)
I am suggesting that
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,267.0.html
this become a subboard of
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,119.0.html
If not adverts, maybe general rsc?

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:28, topic:530026”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648783.msg4362417#msg4362417 date=1379016578]
Time to use your words though thanks!

[quote]this is a suggestion, and is called for community input/debate.
[/quote]

Again, directly quote me where I said it will ruin the community. This is a suggestion on a place where I believe it would fit better NOT about if this is good for the community.
[/quote]regardless of whether it would fit better in “RSC” boards or not.

with that sort of logic, we could put GRAPHICS and MODELS with multimedia
and we could put all minecraft / moparcraft discussion under “talk about other games”[/quote]^ and there are/were already suggestions for those very things so consider this the suggestion for the moving of this.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:26, topic:530026”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648783.msg4362410#msg4362410 date=1379016182]
^ Quote where I stated it will ruin the community please so I can change it? What I am getting at is that it’s pointless to make something if it’s going to be the same cycle as everything else.
[/quote]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648783.msg4362410#msg4362410 date=1379016182]
^ Quote where I stated it will ruin the community please so I can change it? What I am getting at is that it’s pointless to make something if it’s going to be the same cycle as everything else.
[/quote][/quote]I must be blind nowhere do I state in that quote will it ruin it. when I cycle like everything else I mean that it will be active today, and inactive the next week. You knew exactly what I meant.

Time to use your words though thanks!

this is a suggestion, and is called for community input/debate.

Again, directly quote me where I said it will ruin the community. This is a suggestion on a place where I believe it would fit better NOT about if this is good for the community.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:22, topic:530026”]why does it even matter? it’s not hurting anyone in any way and it’s at the bottom of the forum, so just ignore it. mscp finally has an “official server” for something rs related and you throw a fit about it having it’s own board; typical l&p posting just to post.[/quote]thanks babe means a lot?

If the board actually got active and STAYED active I could see it having it’s own board but sadly I can already see in a year it will be dead again. Just like Moparcraft, just like gamedev, just like rs2007 has already become… a graveyard.

Give me a break at least I still am not going on about the female topic :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

:palm:

While I can’t claim that everything on moparscape is because of runescape classic I still claim the fact that some of the brightest minds in this community have been affiliated it. Whether it’s bot or server development most of the stuff you see originated from RSC.

CodeForFame
Dexto
eXemplar
Joe0
KO9
latifundio
misterhat
Nemmyz
pd
Peeter
punKrockeR
Reines
roboscv
Rodgerwilco
Sean
stork
TheDjinn
xEnt
zerrentar
Object/Protosstribe(ephemeral)
BobDole81
RLN
Bakatool
Miss Silabsoft
Frank_
sw0o0sh

I am sure there are more and sorry if I missed you on the list
You can check out the history here. If you have a since of respect for these guys and their accomplishments you would know that a simple board at the bottom of the page is not a big issue.

As for the MoparRS2 server it’s perfectly capable of becoming a reality if you guys put your mind and free time towards it. Which Vain_ is correct, it would get its own board. If MoparClassic grows (which we are intending) we will move to classic.moparisthebest.com or something of that nature but right now I don’t understand why you’re complaining.

Read full topic

he’s offered to pay for servers/tools, etc that are all open source

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement

item.description:

[quote=“Vain_, post:14, topic:530026”]we almost had an official rs2 server (b00mer and blake wrote) and mitb started the payment process, but b00mer backed out of it

if it would have went through, im 99.9% positive it would have had it’s own section.[/quote]

moparclassic it’s a development of rscangel released by KO9 and rsca is based on the leaked rscdaemon.

the label of mopar was put on it and it became the community server, i guess it should have been like that for the rs2 so there is no need for efficient/paid server.

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:13, topic:530026”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648783.msg4362293#msg4362293 date=1379000495]

I don’t see any problem with having an official board for the official classic server. It’s been in development for a long time and has just recently launched, it’s not going to be huge right off the bat.
[/quote]The way I see it at least is that there are servers out there that have been up for a very long time that don’t have their own board so why does moparclassic need one? We have had the mopar client for years upon end and it never needed it’s own board. Can you really and truly say it’s a needed item to have a board solely for one rsc development?

For one, it is the official server for Moparscape, those other servers are not. Also, the moparscape client actually did have its own dedicated board up until a while ago. It was a separate section to the current client help section.[/quote]Exactly my point I appreciate you pointing this out. What was the staffs reasoning on this? From what I understand/under the assumption it was because it was too inactive. So I have to ask now, why would the staff then post something else that is going to be too inactive compared to the other boards?

Another good example…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

If MoparCraft was merged back don’t you think sooner or later the same will happen to MoparRSC?

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

pretty sure he plans to run the server when launch is ready

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and as long as the server is fully open source and written by you/team members (given everything is accredited and has no jagex code) it would work.

we almost had an official rs2 server (b00mer and blake wrote) and mitb started the payment process, but b00mer backed out of it

if it would have went through, im 99.9% positive it would have had it’s own section.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:530026”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=648783.msg4362290#msg4362290 date=1378999653]
I don’t see any problem with having an official board for the official classic server. It’s been in development for a long time and has just recently launched, it’s not going to be huge right off the bat.
[/quote]The way I see it at least is that there are servers out there that have been up for a very long time that don’t have their own board so why does moparclassic need one? We have had the mopar client for years upon end and it never needed it’s own board. Can you really and truly say it’s a needed item to have a board solely for one rsc development?[/quote]

For one, it is the official server for Moparscape, those other servers are not. Also, the moparscape client actually did have its own dedicated board up until a while ago. It was a separate section to the current client help section.

I am also pretty sure Moparisthebest was going to host this also, however alternative hosting was found and it was obviously more convenient. Don’t quote me on it, but I’m fairly certain that was the case.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Again, MITB isn’t hosting any of this and as far as I have read there hasn’t been any apparent or at least visual proof that there is funding going towards this from him directly.

I could make a rs2 server right now and say it’s “for the community” and that would warrant it with your logic. As I am a member of the community, and making the server open source for the community.

As a matter of fact now that I think about it somebody did do something like this now who was it…

By your logic also that’s like saying somebody like Mendorphins who made the tools package shoudl have his own board so people can “request” and “suggest” tools to go into the package. As the tool package had intentions of being supplied “for the community”

Edit: even funnier is this

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Why is he posting an advertisement type of related item in the rsc section if he has his own board solely for the development?

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:530026”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=648783.msg4362290#msg4362290 date=1378999653]
I don’t see any problem with having an official board for the official classic server. It’s been in development for a long time and has just recently launched, it’s not going to be huge right off the bat.
[/quote]The way I see it at least is that there are servers out there that have been up for a very long time that don’t have their own board so why does moparclassic need one? We have had the mopar client for years upon end and it never needed it’s own board. Can you really and truly say it’s a needed item to have a board solely for one rsc development?

To take it a step further I gather there is an irc already for mprsc/mprs whatever abbreviations you guys plan to make… then I would have to assume separate forums for the development ( with the developers administrating it) would be more appropriate. That is what everyone else does when they make a server development they make their own forums. As the server to my knowledge isn’t being funded by MITB specifically I just consider this another development that luckily been up for a long time.

@Vain, not a web person I don’t know the proper name of the little square images to the left of the index that show if there are new posts etc…[/quote]those 'server’s arent driven by the community. regardless of how long it’s been up.

moparclassic is open source and ANYONE can submit commits and pull requests.
that’s the reason it gets it’s own board. by the community, for the community.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]Moparclassic rearrangement
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:9, topic:530026”]I don’t see any problem with having an official board for the official classic server. It’s been in development for a long time and has just recently launched, it’s not going to be huge right off the bat.[/quote]The way I see it at least is that there are servers out there that have been up for a very long time that don’t have their own board so why does moparclassic need one? We have had the mopar client for years upon end and it never needed it’s own board. Can you really and truly say it’s a needed item to have a board solely for one rsc development?

To take it a step further I gather there is an irc already for mprsc/mprs whatever abbreviations you guys plan to make… then I would have to assume separate forums for the development ( with the developers administrating it) would be more appropriate. That is what everyone else does when they make a server development they make their own forums. As the server to my knowledge isn’t being funded by MITB specifically I just consider this another development that luckily been up for a long time.

@Vain, not a web person I don’t know the proper name of the little square images to the left of the index that show if there are new posts etc…

Nonetheless, I’m sure the staff will discuss this further in the staff board and have already discussed this already partially with their own self if they made an announcement so hopefully some more consideration will be done on the matter at least.
